SEARCH
Package org.hms.services.staffmanagement

Interface IStaffManagementDataInterface

All Superinterfaces:
IDataInterface
public interface IStaffManagementDataInterface extends IDataInterface
IStaffManagementDataInterface defines the methods required for managing staff data, including adding, updating, retrieving, and searching for staff members.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addStaff(Staff staff)
    Adds a new staff member.
    void
    archiveStaff(int staffId)
    Archives a staff member's data by marking them with an "archived" status.
    void
    assignRole(int staffId, String role)
    Assigns a role to a staff member.
    void
    changeStatus(int staffId, String status)
    Changes the status (e.g., active, inactive, archived) of a staff member.
    Staff
    getStaff(int staffId)
    Retrieves a staff member by their ID.
    List<String>
    getStaffRoles(int staffId)
    Retrieves a list of roles associated with a specific staff member.
    StaffTable
    getStaffTable()
    Retrieves the StaffTable instance used for managing staff data.
    List<Staff>
    listAllStaff()
    Lists all active staff members.
    void
    removeStaff(int staffId, boolean softDelete)
    Removes a staff member, with an option for soft or hard deletion.
    List<Staff>
    searchStaff(String criteria)
    Searches for staff members based on a specific criterion.
    void
    updateStaff(int staffId, Staff staff)
    Updates existing staff information.

  • Method Details

    • addStaff

      void addStaff(Staff staff)
      Adds a new staff member.
      Parameters:
      staff - the Staff object representing the new staff member

    • updateStaff

      void updateStaff(int staffId, Staff staff)
      Updates existing staff information.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the ID of the staff member to update
      staff - the updated Staff object

    • getStaff

      Staff getStaff(int staffId)
      Retrieves a staff member by their ID.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the ID of the staff member to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Staff object if found, otherwise null

    • listAllStaff

      List<Staff> listAllStaff()
      Lists all active staff members.
      Returns:
      a List of all active Staff objects

    • searchStaff

      List<Staff> searchStaff(String criteria)
      Searches for staff members based on a specific criterion.
      Parameters:
      criteria - the search criteria (e.g., role, gender, status)
      Returns:
      a List of Staff objects matching the search criteria

    • removeStaff

      void removeStaff(int staffId, boolean softDelete)
      Removes a staff member, with an option for soft or hard deletion.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the ID of the staff member to remove
      softDelete - true for a soft delete (mark as inactive), false for a hard delete

    • assignRole

      void assignRole(int staffId, String role)
      Assigns a role to a staff member.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the ID of the staff member
      role - the role to be assigned to the staff member

    • changeStatus

      void changeStatus(int staffId, String status)
      Changes the status (e.g., active, inactive, archived) of a staff member.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the ID of the staff member
      status - the new status to assign to the staff member

    • archiveStaff

      void archiveStaff(int staffId)
      Archives a staff member's data by marking them with an "archived" status.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the ID of the staff member to archive

    • getStaffRoles

      List<String> getStaffRoles(int staffId)
      Retrieves a list of roles associated with a specific staff member.
      Parameters:
      staffId - the ID of the staff member
      Returns:
      a List of role names associated with the staff member

    • getStaffTable

      StaffTable getStaffTable()
      Retrieves the StaffTable instance used for managing staff data.
      Returns:
      the StaffTable instance
